Calculate Subgroup Effect (HR or OR)

Source: R/plotting.R
calculate_subgroup_effect.Rd

Calculate Subgroup Effect (HR or OR)

Usage

calculate_subgroup_effect(
  df,
  subgroup_var,
  subgroup_level,
  endpoint_type,
  time_var,
  event_var_use,
  trt_var,
  ref_group,
  conf_level
)

Arguments

df

Data frame

subgroup_var

Subgroup variable name (NULL for overall)

subgroup_level

Subgroup level value

endpoint_type

"tte" or "binary"

time_var

Time variable for TTE

event_var_use

Event variable for TTE

trt_var

Treatment variable

ref_group

Reference group

conf_level

Confidence level

Value

List with estimate, CI, counts, etc.
